entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple dispose called for chained dependency injection - Is it actual a bug? #97475
  • ./build.sh --test fails to find 'xunit.console.dll' #97470
  • Segmentation fault on .NET 6 - Linux Ubuntu 18.04 #97467
  • Expression.Lambda() performance degradation and system outage with over 16 arguments #97466
  • Expose WASM Hot Reload capabilities via `.props` file for consumption by `dotnet watch` #97462
    9.0.0
  • ICorDebugFunction5::DisableOpimizations causes target app to be terminated on Linux #97461
  • Regex evaluation bug - discrepancy between compiled and non-compiled regex #97455
    9.0.0
  • Implementation of Runtime Interceptors for Enhanced Development in .NET #97453
  • ARM32 (and possibly some others) might take locks in Interlocked FCalls #97452
  • [browser] Support AppContext switches on runtime #97449
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient correct way to avoid sending SNIs #97444
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Got Dependency Error #97442
  • [browser][MT] RangePartitionerTests.RunPartitionerStaticTest_SingleChunking timeout #97440
    9.0.0
  • GC/API/Refresh/Refresh failing in outer loop runs #97437
  • Stateful interop marshallers cannot be copy free on both managed and unmanaged side #97435
  • [API Proposal]: GC level ObjectPooling APIs and more #97434

Closed

  • `InlineArray` size validation does not handle all cases #95193
  • Update some of NativeAOT's uses of Lock to use non-alertable waits #97105
    9.0.0
  • Custom JsonConverter for Dictionary<string. object> #97478
  • Native AOT Testing Improvements #79316
    9.0.0
  • How to have System.Text.Json skip properties of types that are not serializable? #97472
  • Feature switch with ILLink substitution does not always trim branches #90034
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression on ASP.NET #97406
  • Too large individual GC pause (~ 4 minutes) while total memory isn't large #97018
  • JIT does not recognize typeof(X) == o.GetType() checks as intrinsics with R2R #97134
  • AsnWriter.WriteObjectIdentifier permits invalid sub identifier #97419
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensor test failures on CoreCLR #97297
    9.0.0
  • Reading in Stream from ZipPackagePart results in incomplete read of file #97431

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Remove Mono Android Device Startup testing from performance testing. #97484
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve performance of Order{By}{Descending}(...).First/Last #97483
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Late cast expansion: delete expansion in importer #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97479
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move AppWithCustomEntryPoints ond ComponentWithNoDependencies to pre-built test assets #97477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97476
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #97471
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove helper frames #97469
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow TernaryLogic to optimize down to BlendVariableMask where appropriate #97468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add build analysis config file to runtime #97465
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of capture groups inside of negative lookarounds #97463
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Cleanup dspRegMask to allow sharing the main loop #97459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak Enumerable.ToArray to reduce some overheads #97458
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Merge fgRemoveConditionalJump and fgOptimizeBranchToNext #97456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump to new Ubuntu 22.04 queue for PPC64 #97451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE_DD_2A & SVE_DG_2A #97446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] GCC crosscompile fixes #97445
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] Kill abandoned JSWebWorker threads during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Restrict Refresh test platforms #97439
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HW_4A` to `SVE_IU_4A_C` #97433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • enforce FIELD_OFFSET_LAST_REAL_OFFSET size limit for InlineArrays #97403
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Updating Vector<T> to support opt-in 512-bit widths #97460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds" #97454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #97387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Enumerable.Range to support Vector<int>.Count <= 16 #97464
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] update owners #97329
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #97090
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97418
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/9.0-preview1] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #97457
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview1] [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97428
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Remove remaining references to obsolete JIT configuration variables #97438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SystemDataSqlClientVersion from 4.8.5 -> 4.8.6 #97430
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that TYP_MASK locals are properly tracked and have correct info in the JIT dump #97422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert isExactType check to JIT/EE interface call #97424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the definition of TARGET_BROWSER in CMake #97254
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal #97392
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Validate sub-identifier when encoding ObjectIdentifier #97420
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 9.0.0
  • Fix XML docs in TimeProvider #97450
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of loop alignment targets #97367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable CreateBroadcasting_AllMethodsOverridden test for native AOT #97436
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Decrease frequency of chrome version bumps #97373
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests dispose threads #97390
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Logging, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Specify higher equality tolerance for ReciprocalEstimate tests #97332
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Properly display `BBJ_COND` true and false targets in `dspKind()` #97425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes GCToOSInterface::GetCurrentProcessId #97429
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use TensorPrimitives.ElementWiseSelect instead of ConditionalSelect in more places #97282
    area-System.Numerics
  • Refresh Test #91833
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable more tests #97391
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve call args interference checking when stores are involved #97409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the now Deprecated TEST_BIG_ENDIAN to CMAKE_C_BYTE_ORDER #97426
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up gtCloneExpr #97411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Proposed fix for issue #93189. #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CZ_4A to IF_SVE_CZ_4A_L group #97393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • NativeAOT: Inline tls access on linux/x64 #97413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Hash code tests cleanup #97299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, test-enhancement
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][mt] Run all tests #97270
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add clrgcexp to NetCoreApp #97401
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Should we drop WasmImport and use DllImport #2414
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove unix file Internal\Runtime\FrozenObjectHeapManager.Unix.cs #2476
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Turn on TargetSupportsWritingFieldData for Wasm #2477

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable warn-as-error for libraries tests in CI #2494
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement time zone handling #2491
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temp dir buildup when there's backslases in usernames #38239
  • Determine WASM Hot Reload capabilities without hard-coded defaults in `dotnet watch` #38236

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38241
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow for GenAPI to include additional API #38232
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38206
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2361514 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add MSI garbage collection for side-by-side workload manifests #38143
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Params parameters are implicitly `scoped` #7868

Merged

  • Create CL-2024-01-23.md #7866

Updated

  • Add native lock speclet #7849
  • Update ref struct interfaces based on LDM discussions #7865
  • Collection expressions: implicit collections in spreads and foreach #7534

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref safety violation is not detected when property accessors have parameters with different EffectiveScope. #71798
  • Add an API to discover if a symbol is a WellKnownType that effects public API behavior #71790
  • Informational version with too many dots produces zero product version in VS_FIXEDFILEINFO Win32 version resources #71789
  • OpenProjectAsync() is failing in docker container with base image of mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0 #71784

Closed

  • IDE0305 suggests changing away from dedicated ToArray method #71788
  • It is not possible to compile a switch expression that calls a method with the DoesNotReturn attribute and always throws an exception #71786
  • Nested catch rethrows the parent exception in async methods #71569
    17.10
  • Make ProgrammaticSuppressionInfo public #69000
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Recreate the get accessor when extracting an interface member #71797
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove dependency on IFindUsageContext from DefinitionItemExtensions #71795
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update NuGetAuthenticate to 1 #71791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableArray allocations around AssemblyIdentity #71783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup VSIX asset inclusion #71782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Ban use-collection-expression in a particular case #71796
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support lexing razor comments #71697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle unconverted collection expressions in nullable analysis #71792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't reference S.R.C.Unsafe in net7.0 or newer #71787
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Clean up the IntelliSense option pages #71777
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable OSX queue #71778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add native lock feature status #71769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update our syntax list types to be "collection builder" types. #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetExpansionClient #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Another attempt at publishing bootstrap logs #71774
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConnectionResetException flood #53591
  • Blazor web app @rendermode="InteractiveServer" Losing Claims #53588
  • [Blazor] `AddServerSideblazor` fails without `AddRazorPages` #53587
    .NET 9 Planning
  • 8.0 BlazorWebAppOidc IDX21323: RequireNonce is 'False' #53585
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Cannot find a way to enable SSR in angular new dotnet template #53584
  • After Upgrade vom 8.0.0 to 8.0.1 => Automaticly restarted service is not working #53582

Closed

  • [SupplyParameterFromQuery] property not being set during OnInitializedAsync #53055
  • AuthenticationStateProvider custom implementation in .NET 8 #53182
  • Scoped CSS Not Working Correctly for Components in the Root 'Pages' Folder #53248
  • PlatformNotSupported exceptions in WindowsARM infrastructure for release/6.0 #49061
  • Set the current culture at the application level in an ASP.NET Core 8.0 application #53590
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc #53494
  • Perf regression: mvc #53505
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53550
  • Perf regression: https, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #53551
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plainTextSansFilter #53554
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plaintext #53556
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53558
  • Perf regression: json, single_query #53574
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json, single_query #53578
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes #53579
  • Improve handling of JSDisconnectedExceptions #53571
  • Dev tunnels - project bound configuration #53298
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53580
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53581
  • Options to prevent delegate event handlers automatically trigger a UI render #53583
  • Blazor server performance improvements #38127
    .NET 9 Planning
  • StaticHtmlRenderer escapes apostrophes/quotes unnecessarily, breaking script blocks #52547
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Unable to configure Data Protection via IOptionsMonitor<DataProtectionOptions> #51190
  • DataProtectionBuilder API enhancement #45228
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Transient failure to refresh a key ring produces a 500 response #33116
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk to v3.1.2 #53603
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24074.8 #53602
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `563ebf1` #53599
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96cd50c` to `563ebf1` #53598
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `563ebf1` #53597
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `563ebf1` #53596
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • updating Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to cover CVE warning #53589
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove trailing comma from fabricbot.json #53595
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Add submodule updates for release/8.0 #53593
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53545
    area-mvc
  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #53539
    area-dataprotection
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    area-networking
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [gcdump] objects are sometimes missing from Android dumps #4477

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Window.Destroying event not fired when you swipe the app away on Android #20146
  • Windows scroll bar configure to be always visible and always expanded... #20145
  • Disabling a SwipeView disables the underlying items #20142
  • GoToAsync returns user to desired page but previous page's OnAppearing() is triggered #20141
  • Xcode 15+ VS 17.8.5 Can't get Simulators #20138
  • MainDisplayInfo reports page size instead of screen size in .net 8 #20137
  • iOS iPad Entry Control: Tab on an external keyboard does not move between UI Elements #20135
  • Breakpoints do not work when debugging configuration other than Debug #20132
  • MAUI Shell FlyoutHeader is not showing properly on iOS in landscape mode #20131
  • Label Truncation and MaxLines options do not work when combined #20128
  • [MAUI][.NET8] ‘Review’ module jumps repeatedly when editing recipe page. #20126

Closed

  • [Android] Legacy Gallery locking up on issue search when you search with a number #20143
  • Can only ignore iOS Safe Area when navigation bar is hidden #17022
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Bundling WASDK in Packaged application throws `TypeInitializationException` #19167
    .NET 8 SR2
  • How to handle AppWindow closing event before close window on MacOS? #20134
  • iOS - MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() doesn't work if Limited permission (Selected Photos) for Photo Gallery #14973
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Rework/rename/delete IMauiInitializeScopedService #19591
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Enable Scope Validation for dependency injection in .NET MAUI during development #11457
    .NET 8 SR2
  • CollectionView for WinUI flicker problem in 8.0.6 #20043
    .NET 8 SR2
  • .NET Maui todo list problem #20123

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Release checklist #32915
  • How to Increase the Size of VARCHAR results of OPENJSON in EF Core 8 Contains Query #32913
  • ComplexProperty with AsSplitQuery #32911
  • Invalid column name 'key' in SQL Server JSON query #32910
  • Group by in subquery produces wrong result when the source is empty #32909
  • .NET8, MS VS 2022 17.8.4, Entity Framework runtime error with "Any" #32908
  • Can I use several ExecutionStrategy ? #32907
  • Copied entity with navigation properties causes duplication of navigation entities #32904
  • Bug or Ignorance? SelectMany with Distinct and Sum #32903

Closed

  • await dbContext.Database.SqlQuery<*>(....).ToListAsync() hang #32906
  • The current provider doesn't have a store type mapping for properties of type 'DateIndex'. #32583
    9.0.0
  • AsSplitQuery not working with sort string.Join #32749

PullRequests

Created

  • Added ToHashSetAsync<T> Extension methods on IQueryable<T> #32905

Merged

  • Cleanup of TPC handling #32891
  • Update branding to preview2 #32912
  • Use configured default type mappings in ExecuteSql #32902
  • Update Mono.TextTemplating to new preview package #32895
  • Stop using case-insensitive comparisons for indexed properties #32899

Updated

  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443
  • Translate to NULLIF #32710
  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Add complex type mappings to the default relational mappings #32901
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32894
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Reenable some SDK tests for the internal PR builds #17223
  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #17426

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Evaluate usefulness and correctness of ValidateBundledManifestSigning target #18208

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK baseline and exclusions #18374
  • Add Blue Oak license to allow list #18372
  • Update arcade SDK for new unified build switches #18365

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18363
  • Fix command line escape #18373
  • Exclude repos that currently don't build for VB #18368
  • [main] Exclusion for unknown license in spectre-console #18371
  • Exclusion for unknown license in spectre-console #18370
  • [main] update the 8.0 implicit version #18360
  • update the 8.0 implicit version #18359
  • Enable build.sh for non source build scenarios #18358
  • Cloak files from Windows repos #18280
  • Fix NUGET_PACKAGES directory on Windows #18354
